title: Solving the efficiency of Gram-negative bacteria

title_detail.value: Solving the efficiency of Gram-negative bacteria

summary: Researchers have discovered how antibiotic-resistant bacteria construct their defense system -- a finding that could lead to new treatments for currently untreatable infections.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have discovered how antibiotic-resistant bacteria construct their defense system -- a finding that could lead to new treatments for currently untreatable infections.
